webResources.textAttributionSnippet: (en) “Bottom cracking in strips. Note the different types of timber.”“”First stage of the so-called edge cutting (?). The narrow strip is cut in rejuvenable stands, starting with the younger forest boundary visible on the left (north side). The logs were exported in winter, the paper trees and the halos were cut the following spring.' Postcard number 35 of the Forest Education Office. Nuutajärvi Manor, Urjala, Pirkanmaa - https://www.europeana.eu/item/2021008/_knp_85704. Lusto - The Finnish Forest Museum - http://finna.fi/Record/lusto.knp-85704. CC BY - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
